mapper.select:
select hname, hstar, btitle, haddr, bimage, hspecies, bdate from (select b.hname, h.hstar, b.btitle, h.haddr, b.bimage, h.hspecies, b.bdate from host h, board b where h.hname=b.hname and
b.btype2='바다 조행기' b.btype2='민물 조행기'
order by b.bdate desc) where rownum <6

select (select count(mnum) from member) member,(select count(hnum) from host) host, (select count(rnum) from reservation) reservation,(select count(bnum) from board where btype1 ='유저조행기') board from dual
select hname, hspecies from (select h.hname, h.hspecies, c.cnt from host h, (select count(rnum)cnt, hname from reservation group by hname)c where h.hname = c.hname order by cnt desc) where ROWNUM <7
